parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and argeo; to be entirely idle, literally or figuratively.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
An ordinance, injunction, command, law. From entellomai; injunction, i.e. An authoritative prescription.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
A decree, edict, ordinance. From the base of dokeo; a law.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To create, form, shape, make, always of God. Probably akin to ktaomai; to fabricate, i.e. Found.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Her own, his own, their own, themselves, they. Contracted for heautou; self.
One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Fresh, new, unused, novel. Of uncertain affinity; new
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Two. A primary numeral; 'two'.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Probably from a primary verb eiro; peace; by implication, prosperity.
